about_the_game:
Artwork

24 illustrations in the game with high resolution. The original artwork awaits you if you enjoy the dark fantasy style.

Music

In .wav format with highest quality. Enjoy the dark atmospheric music.
1) Dark Child - 05:56

You can find the content inside the installation folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Partial Nudity

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

name: Dark Fantasy 2: Artwork and OST

short_description: Get the great artwork and music found in the game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
